code: import app from'../../api/baseApi';const getSalaryList=async function(data){try{const response=await app.patch("/employees/salary",data);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};const updateSalary=async function(id,data){try{const response=await app.patch("/attendance/".concat(id),data);return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};const salaryServices={getSalaryList,updateSalary};export default salaryServices;
